Package Model

Class CheckersBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.CheckersBoard

  • public class CheckersBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is represents a checkers board. It handles the representation of the game and ensures that rules of the game are followed during play.

    The CheckersBoard class contains a successor function that checks for all the valid moves in the current state.

    Implementation: - The board is represented as an Piece array of size 64. - It holds 2 Players, that can be either of type Human or Robot. - To identify the current player, a boolean is used. If the it is Player 1's turn the boolean is set to true. - ... extraJump Search ERROR to find incorrect implementations

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckersBoard

        public CheckersBoard​(boolean playerOneStart,
                     Player playerOne,
                     Player playerTwo)
        Player 1 always starts at the top of the board. Player 2 at the bottom.
        Parameters:
        playerOneStart - boolean - true if Player 1 is to start the game
        playerOne - Player - the Player 1 Object
        playerTwo - Player - the Player 2 Object

      • CheckersBoard

        public CheckersBoard​(boolean playerOneStart)
        Player 1 always starts at the top of the board. Player 2 at the bottom.

        If this constructor is used, Players must be added using addPlayers(Model.Player, Model.Player) before the game starts.

        Parameters:
        playerOneStart - true if Player 1 is to start the game
